Explanation: Exact words or statements expressed by a customer about their experience or issue
Document or record detailing the service or repair performed on a vehicle
Specific geographic area managed or serviced by a group of vehicle dealerships
Process or system used to uniquely identify a vehicle using a standardized code
Classification that groups customer comments or issues into specific types for analysis
Input or complaints provided by customers about their service experience
Notes or remarks made by staff based on review of customer feedback or interactions
Summary or detailed account of a problem reported by a customer
Information collected about vehicle repairs customer interactions and dealership performance
System or method used to monitor and manage customer complaints from submission to resolution
